title: Why do I have leaver buster
body: Ummmm I just came out of a 14 day ban, so there was no way I could play I come back I have leaver buster??? But I don’t remember leaving any games maybe I’m bugging out can a rioter tell me when I left so called game??

replies.body: Looks like your 14 day ended on 10-20 and you just received the low priority queue from a match today, 10-22.
makes no sense whats so ever
